title: Harold Finch's Voicemail - Person of Interest HQ Induction Recording, Captions 917-285-7362
author: cocomonk22
comment: One of my favourite shows and this was one of my favourite episodes.

Awesome.

I fucking love this show.
Great job on the marketing. You knew we'd call.
haha that's awesome! thanks for posting this.
I Love this show.  Harold ,  John where are you . ;)
description:
Finch's voicemail as "Harold Wren at Universal Heritage Insurance" when dialing his telephone number (917-285-7362) as shown at the end of season 2 episode 16 "Relevance" of Person of Interest, aired February 21, 2013.

Recorded using an inductive telephone pickup.

Captions added for English SDH.

Note: Last sound effect was not present in the actual message.
